name: Santa in a Dory
short_description: Santa rowing into St. John’s harbour.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A whimsical depiction of Santa arriving in St. John’s, surrounded by jellybean houses and the iconic Rooms museum.

name: Santa Rows Ashore
short_description: Santa rowing past Bell Island’s sea stacks.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A holiday celebration of Newfoundland's rugged coastline, featuring the historic Bell sea stack.

name: Heritage Santa
short_description: Santa wearing a traditional navigator's hat.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A unique depiction of Santa with a maritime navigator's hat adorned with the Newfoundland and Labrador flags, blending heritage and whimsy.

name: Santa at the Cape
short_description: Santa anchoring at Cape Spear lighthouse.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. Santa arrives at Cape Spear, guided by its historic lighthouse, celebrating Newfoundland’s maritime legacy.

name: Santa on George Street
short_description: Santa enjoying the lively George Street.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. Santa takes a festive stroll down George Street, surrounded by its iconic charm and holiday cheer.

name: Santa's Jellybean Row
short_description: Santa with a whimsical jellybean row.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A vibrant depiction of Santa’s beard blending into waves carrying iconic jellybean houses, lighthouses, and fishing stages.

name: The Mariner
short_description: A festive mariner in a traditional setting.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A celebration of Newfoundland’s maritime traditions, featuring a festive mariner with vibrant colors and playful details.

name: The Fiddle Player
short_description: A mummer playing a fiddle in festive spirit.
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. Part of the Mummers Series, this piece celebrates traditional Newfoundland music with a mummer and their fiddle.

name: The Accordion Player
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A whimsical mummer with an accordion, celebrating Newfoundland’s musical traditions in holiday style.

name: Santa's Mummers
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas locally reproduced as a print. A playful depiction of Santa’s beard teeming with mummers and traditional Newfoundland instruments.

name: The Navigator's Hat
detailed_description: Acrylic on canvas with handcrafted frame. An original acrylic painting of Santa’s navigator hat, inspired by Newfoundland’s maritime heritage.

name: Father Christmas Folk Decoration
detailed_description: A unique, hand-painted folk decoration featuring Father Christmas, crafted with reclaimed materials.
